title: Barron's AP Statistics (9th Ed)(gnv64)
description: Barrons AP Statistics (9th Ed) By Martin Sternstein Ph.D. Barron's Educational Series | February 2017 | ISBN-10: 1438009046 | ePUB | 35.5 mb This manual's in-depth preparation for the AP Statistics exam features the 35 absolutely best AP Statistics exam hints found anywhere, and includes: - A diagnostic test and five full-length and up-to-date practice exams - All test questions answered and explained - Additional multiple-choice and free-response questions with answers - A 14-chapter subject review, covering all test topics - A new review chapter highlighting statistical insights into social issues - a new chapter on the Investigative Task, which counts as one-eighth of the exam - A guide to basic uses of TI, Casio, and HP graphing calculators About The Author: Marty Sternstein is a Professor of Mathematics at Ithaca College where he has taught since 1970, except for one year as Visiting Professor and Head of the Math Department at the University of the Virgin Islands, St. Croix, and two years as Fulbright Professor and Math Department Chair at the University of Liberia in West Africa. He has written textbooks in Calculus and Statistics, has been honored with numerous teaching awards, and has developed new curricula, including an ethno-mathematics class, "Math in Africa," and the first U.S. course for college credit in chess theory. Marty has strong interests in national educational and social issues concerning equal access to math education for all. CONTENTS Barron’s Essential 5 Introduction Diagnostic Examination Topic One: Graphical Displays Topic Two: Summarizing Distributions Topic Three: Exploring Bivariate Data Topic Four: Exploring Categorical Data: Two-Way Tables THEME TWO: COLLECTING AND PRODUCING DATA Topic Five: Planning and Conducting Surveys Topic Six: Planning and Conducting Experiments THEME THREE: PROBABILITY Topic Seven: Probability as Relative Frequency Topic Eight: Combining and Transforming Random Variables Topic Nine: The Normal Distribution Topic Ten: Sampling Distributions THEME FOUR: STATISTICAL INFERENCE Topic Eleven: Confidence Intervals Topic Twelve: Tests of Significance—Proportions and Means Topic Thirteen: Tests of Significance—Chi-Square and Slope of Least Squares Line THEME FIVE: MORE PRACTICE AND REVIEW Topic Fourteen: The Investigative Task Topic Fifteen: Statistical Insights into Social Issues Practice Examinations Appendix Answers Explained https://s9.postimg.cc/tfu6xs8y7/Barrons_AP_Statistics_9th_Ed.jpg
